title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2503.8
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2503.8

State Regulations
(a) Within 30 days
after a change in ownership, the new owner shall notify the DHCR of such change
on a form prescribed by the DHCR. Such form shall be signed by the new owner, listing the address of the building or complex, the name, address and telephone
number of the new owner, and the date of the transfer of ownership. (b) Within thirty (30) days after a change in
the address of the managing agent, such managing agent, or, if there is no
managing agent, the owner of a building or group of buildings or development
shall give written notice to the DHCR and to all tenants of the new
address. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2503.8

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
